description: Manage Settings for Azure Arc-Enabled Server.

commands.name: az arcgateway settings update
commands.summary: Update the base Settings of the target resource.
commands.syntax:
az arcgateway settings update [--add]
                              [--base-provider]
                              [--base-resource-name]
                              [--base-resource-type]
                              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--gateway-resource-id]
                              [--ids]
                              [--remove]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--set]
                              [--subscription]
examples: az az arcgateway settings update --resource-group myResourceGroup --subscription mySubscription --base-provider Microsoft.HybridCompute --base-resource-type machines --base-resource-name workloadServer --gateway-resource-id myResourceId
